about_the_game:
You are a frog, every second. You can control your movements only while jumping, or charging a super jump. With this simplicity, it takes seconds to learn how to play, but a very long time to fully master each stage.

There are seven stages, each with its own unique boss battles and stage mechanics. One stage will have you using switches to open parts of the stage, while opening new threats. Another will be about timing, hiding behind pillars. Each stage takes time to learn and master. Once you beat a stage, look at your time and try to get a better one with your newfound mastery.

Every stage outside the final stage has 5 hidden coins to collect for true completion. Some can be gotten with special movements made to teach and test the player, some require going out of the way to get them. Coins are always interesting and fun to collect, and getting all 30 unlocks the final stage.

Can you Leap to the Top?

highlighted.name: G E T  T R O L L E D
The devil and his fallen angels...

You are a frog, every second. You can control your movements only while jumping, or charging a super jump. With this simplicity, it takes seconds to learn how to play, but a very long time to fully master each stage.

There are seven stages, each with its own unique boss battles and stage mechanics. One stage will have you using switches to open parts of the stage, while opening new threats. Another will be about timing, hiding behind pillars. Each stage takes time to learn and master. Once you beat a stage, look at your time and try to get a better one with your newfound mastery.

Every stage outside the final stage has 5 hidden coins to collect for true completion. Some can be gotten with special movements made to teach and test the player, some require going out of the way to get them. Coins are always interesting and fun to collect, and getting all 30 unlocks the final stage.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Mint
  • Processor: i3-2130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Linux might have bugs not in the windows version.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Mint
  • Processor: i3-2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Leap to the Top+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3-2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated
  • Storage: 332 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Can run on a lot lower specs but untested on them
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 4300G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 332 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: You are a frog, leaping automatically every second to the top. But can you beat all 7 of the grueling levels along with defeating powerful foes in this precision platformer? Can you get the best times for true mastery along with collecting all the hidden collectibles in each stage?
